item.title: Renaming Weapons
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

put in these 3 lines

/*3420*/ if (i == Item ID ur using) { /*3442*/ class8.aString170 = "(Name Of wep u want here)"; //EDIT THIS BIT!! /*3443*/ class8.aByteArray178 = "(examine info here)".getBytes();

add that with ur existing customs and it will overwrite any premade wep on server too if u use its id

—Notes—
ONLY PUT IN THOSE 3 LINES AND NOTHING ELSE!!! unless u want a retarded looking weapon or one that looks like one of ur customs lol

Read full topic

item.title: Renaming Weapons
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:4, topic:306766”]it is class8

for example it’ll have something like

/*3420*/ if (i == 15033) { /*3421*/ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; /*3422*/ class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; /*3423*/ class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; /*3424*/ class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; /*3425*/ class8.anIntArray156[0] = 61; /*3426*/ class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; /*3427*/ class8.anIntArray156[1] = 57; /*3428*/ class8.anIntArray160[1] = 0; /*3429*/ class8.anIntArray156[2] = 7054; /*3430*/ class8.anIntArray160[2] = 924; /*3431*/ class8.anInt174 = 2339; /*3432*/ class8.anInt181 = 1560; /*3433*/ class8.anInt190 = 344; /*3434*/ class8.anInt198 = 1104; /*3435*/ class8.anInt204 = 0; /*3436*/ class8.anInt169 = -6; /*3437*/ class8.anInt194 = -14; /*3438*/ class8.anInt165 = 486; /*3439*/ class8.anInt200 = 486; /*3440*/ class8.anInt175 = -1; /*3441*/ class8.anInt197 = -1; /*3442*/ class8.aString170 = "Dragon Kiteshield(blk)"; //EDIT THIS BIT!! /*3443*/ class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Dragon kiteshield!".getBytes();[/quote]

This is only how to edit your customs, how do you actually change the name of weapons like Dragon Mace, Granite Maul, etc…

Read full topic

it is class8

for example it’ll have something like

/*3420*/ if (i == 15033) { /*3421*/ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; /*3422*/ class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; /*3423*/ class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; /*3424*/ class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; /*3425*/ class8.anIntArray156[0] = 61; /*3426*/ class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; /*3427*/ class8.anIntArray156[1] = 57; /*3428*/ class8.anIntArray160[1] = 0; /*3429*/ class8.anIntArray156[2] = 7054; /*3430*/ class8.anIntArray160[2] = 924; /*3431*/ class8.anInt174 = 2339; /*3432*/ class8.anInt181 = 1560; /*3433*/ class8.anInt190 = 344; /*3434*/ class8.anInt198 = 1104; /*3435*/ class8.anInt204 = 0; /*3436*/ class8.anInt169 = -6; /*3437*/ class8.anInt194 = -14; /*3438*/ class8.anInt165 = 486; /*3439*/ class8.anInt200 = 486; /*3440*/ class8.anInt175 = -1; /*3441*/ class8.anInt197 = -1; /*3442*/ class8.aString170 = "Dragon Kiteshield(blk)"; //EDIT THIS BIT!! /*3443*/ class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Dragon kiteshield!".getBytes();
